newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine car firm sets 550 mln peso expansion.
newsitem.headline: Philippine car firm sets 550 mln peso expansion.

text.p: Philippines' Commercial Motors Corp (CMC) said on Thursday it is set to invest 550 million pesos this year to expand its assembly facility in the country.
CMC is the exclusive assembler and distributor in the Philippines of Mercedez Benz cars which are produced by Daimler-Benz AG.
CMC vice president Patrick Lee said the expanded facility will assemble Musso sports utility vehicles which were launched on Thursday.
Musso cars are four-wheel drive vehicles powered by engines developed by Mercedes Benz and manufactured by Ssang Yong Motor Co of South Korea.
